meanings.definition: The act of interweaving three or more strands of material
meanings.sent1: She learned how to do braiding with yarn in art class.
meanings.sent2: Her braiding of the ribbons in her hair looked beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The braiding of the shoelaces made them look like a colorful braid.
meanings.sent4: The intricate braiding of the ropes created a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The braiding of the threads formed a sturdy fabric.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which hair is woven into a pattern
meanings.sent1: Her braiding of her hair was neat and elegant.
meanings.sent2: She decided to wear a braiding style for the party.
meanings.sent3: The braiding of her hair made her look like a princess.
meanings.sent4: The braiding of her hair resembled a beautiful braid of gold.
meanings.sent5: The intricate braiding of her hair showcased her creativity.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a strong, flexible structure by intertwining materials
meanings.sent1: The braiding of the wires ensured a secure connection.
meanings.sent2: The basket was made using a technique of braiding the reeds.
meanings.sent3: The braiding of the vines made the fence look unique.
meanings.sent4: The braiding of the ropes created a durable net.
meanings.sent5: The intricate braiding of the fibers resulted in a resilient material.
